questList.questDescription: The Shadowed Abyssal Horror, Nocturnal Dreadstalker, threatens the balance in Ethereal Woods. You must either defeat or unite with this legendary sorcerer to proceed.
The Sylvan Guardian, Elven Warding Sentinel, seeks allies to protect the Ethereal Woods. Join forces with this formidable bastion to receive the amulet of healing.
The Radiant Illusionist, Luminous Shapechanging Spirit, must be defeated to gain the amulet of alliance. Beware of its tricky illusions and formidable powers.
The Blazebringer Salamander, Infernal Tempest Bringer, challenges all who enter the Luminous Caverns. Decide whether to defeat or ally with this formidable sorcerer to progress.
The Abyssal Serpent Sage, Serpentine Ritual Guardian, holds the key to healing in the Luminous Caverns. Unite with this strong fighter to receive the amulet of healing.
Defeat the Spectral Equine Mirage, Phantasmal Centaur Echo, to earn the amulet of alliance. Beware of its moderate powers and elusive nature.
Your ultimate challenge awaits in the Shadowed Citadel. You must vanquish the Ethereal Shadow Stalker, Aurorium, to claim victory and bring light back to the Celestial Realm of Radiant Harmony.
The Ethereal Sentinel, Spectral Guardian Statue, stands as a guardian in the Shadowed Citadel. Unite with this mighty protector to receive the amulet of healing.
The Necrotic Spellweaver, Ancient Undead Archmage, must be defeated to earn the amulet of alliance. Face the formidable sorcerer and claim your reward.
